name: Breakpong
description:
Breakpong is a combination Pong clone, and Breakout clone. It's a 2 player game made for the Mini Ludum Dare #58, where the theme was "Pong".


You can find the other games for Ludum Dare #58 here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/minild-58/?action=previ...

Controls:

W/S: Player 1

⬆️/⬇️: Player 2

ESC: Pause


Blocks are worth one point, losing the ball costs you three points. First to 11 wins!
